Package model

package model
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Brush
    Represents the main class for a Paint graphical user interface.
    CanvasResizer
    CanvasResizer: Manages the resizing of a drawing canvas.
    Circle
    Circle: Subclass of DrawingTool for drawing circles.
    DrawingExplorer
    DrawingExplorer: Manages drawing-related actions and alerts in the application.
    DrawingTool
    Abstract base class for drawing tools.
    Eraser
    Eraser: Subclass of DrawingTool for erasing content.
    Fill
    Fill: Subclass of DrawingTool for filling enclosed areas.
    Rectangle
    Rectangle: Subclass of DrawingTool for drawing rectangles.
    Select
    Select: Represents a drawing tool for selecting and manipulating objects on the canvas.
    SprayPaintBrush
    SprayPaintBrush: Represents a spray paint brush tool for artistic effects.
    Square
    Square: Subclass of DrawingTool for drawing squares.
    TextTool
    This class represents the text logic, which handles all the necessary changes or logic for the text feature
    Triangle
    Triangle: Subclass of DrawingTool for drawing Triangles.
    UndoRedoManager
    UndoRedoManager: Manages undo and redo functionality for user actions.
    WatercolorBrush
    WatercolorBrush: Represents a watercolor brush tool for drawing.
